message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product, which I believe will be a valuable asset for your business. My initial price is $1,500,000. I understand this may be a bit higher than you initially anticipated, but I'm confident the value it brings will justify the investment. What do you think?

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me. Can you meet me at this price?
